statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_survey;
SELECT survey_question, survey_answer FROM feedback_survey WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM feedback_survey WHERE response_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_answer, survey_question, response_date FROM feedback_survey WHERE student_id = 456 ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM feedback_survey;
SELECT * FROM feedback_survey WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY response_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT survey_question, survey_answer FROM feedback_survey WHERE survey_answer LIKE '%good%'
SELECT id, survey_question, response_date FROM feedback_survey WHERE student_id = 2 ORDER BY response_date ASC
SELECT * FROM feedback_survey WHERE response_date > '2021-09-01' AND response_date < '2021-10-01'
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students FROM feedback_survey
SELECT * FROM surveys;
SELECT student_name, course_name, submitted_at FROM surveys ORDER BY submitted_at DESC;
SELECT survey_id, student_name, course_name, submitted_at FROM surveys WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(*) AS response_count FROM responses GROUP BY survey_id;
SELECT survey_id, AVG(question_number) AS avg_question_number FROM responses GROUP BY survey_id;
SELECT * FROM surveys WHERE student_name = 'Alice'
SELECT survey_id, course_name FROM surveys WHERE submitted_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_surveys FROM surveys
SELECT student_name, AVG(question_number) AS avg_question_number FROM responses GROUP BY student_name
SELECT s.student_name, r.question_number, r.response_value FROM surveys s INNER JOIN responses r ON s.survey_id = r.survey_id
SELECT * FROM OnlineSurveys;
SELECT survey_id, rating, timestamp FROM OnlineSurveys WHERE survey_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM Students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT category_name, description FROM FeedbackCategories WHERE category_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT MAX(rating) AS max_rating, MIN(rating) AS min_rating FROM OnlineSurveys;
SELECT survey_id, student_id, feedback, rating, timestamp FROM OnlineSurveys WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, age FROM Students WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 25 ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT category_id, category_name, description FROM FeedbackCategories WHERE category_name = 'Technical Support';
SELECT survey_id, student_id, feedback, rating, timestamp FROM OnlineSurveys WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND rating <= 2 ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, age FROM Students WHERE age >= 30 AND email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT student_id, response_text FROM survey_responses WHERE response_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT response_id, response_text, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT response_id, response_text, response_date FROM survey_responses;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM instructors WHERE instructor_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM survey_responses JOIN students ON survey_responses.student_id = students.student_id WHERE response_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_responses;
SELECT response_id, student_id, timestamp FROM feedback_responses WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT survey_title, start_date, end_date FROM surveys WHERE survey_id = 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE age > 25;
SELECT course_name, instructor, duration FROM courses ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_responses WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT survey_title, survey_description FROM surveys WHERE start_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY survey_title ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE duration > 6 ORDER BY duration DESC, course_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM students WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT response_id, response, rating FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = 3 AND student_id = 2 ORDER BY rating DESC;
